question: You hear about a new business coming to town and you don't approve of the new owners. What do you want to tell the politicians and neighbors?

options.option: This makes me uncomfortable, I vote for single family zoning.
Let's welcome them and make our neighborhood more diverse!
I mind my own business and keep to myself.

question: Single Family Zoning is being argued in the Supreme Court.  Luckily you know a few of the Justices and they will listen to your opinion. What do you want to tell them?

options.option: The reasons people live in different types of housing is economic, this zoning segregates people and exclusionary zoning should be struck down.
It's important to protect the character of a neighborhood.  If a majority of people in a region want to exclude certain housing types, they should be free to do so.
There's more money to be made in a neighborhood if different housing types are available.  Exclusionary zoning isn't economically smart, strike it down and deem it unconstitutional.
This isn't happening in my town so I don't think it's right for me to have an opinion here.
